data_table.description: Fasting/Tracking Form, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: FTRBFLAG
variable.description: =1 If Form Is Present [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FTRB04A
variable.description: Day last consumed. Q4a [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FTRB05
variable.description: Computed fasting time. Q5 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FTRB06
variable.description: Have you given blood within the last 7 days? Q6 [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 2]

variable.name: FTRB04HM
variable.description: Time of consumption of last food or drink [Fasting/Tracking Form, exam 2]
